name: The Twin-Brush Watchers
description: Hailing from the harsh Marble Desert, the The Twin-Brush Watchers are known for their skill in shadow magic. Specifically moving from shadow and shadow, smuggling goods within the shadows of clueless civilians. Now renowned portrayers - those who are able to summon their imaginings into reality via brushstroke, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
